messages.subject: Getsumei Seiki
messages.msgSnippet: I didn t know that you could read for free the first chapter of Getsumei Seiki. For those who are interested:
messages.messageBody:
I didn't know that you could read for free the first
chapter of Getsumei Seiki.

For those who are interested:

http://www.youngsunday.com/rensai/comics/getsumei.html#

Click on the righmost red link at the bottom of the
page.

Unfortunately, Japanese only...




=====
Serizawa Kamo

"I am the bone of my sword.
Steel is my body,and fire is my blood.
I have created over a thousand blades.
Unknown to Death.
Nor known to Life.
Have withstood pain to create many weapons.
Yet, those hands will never hold anyting.
So as I pray, unlimited blade works."

(Fate/Stay Night)
